summary.span: 表示 Windows 用户。

span.span: Represents a Windows user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法以创建表示当前用户的 对象。Call the method to create a object that represents the current user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现 接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，请在 `try`/`catch` 块中调用其 方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类的成员。The following example shows the use of members of class. 有关演示如何通过调用非托管 Win32 `LogonUser` 函数获取 Windows 帐户令牌并使用该令牌来模拟其他用户的示例，请参阅 类。For an example showing how to obtain a Windows account token through a call to the unmanaged Win32 `LogonUser` function, and use that token to impersonate another user, see the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CPP/windowsidentitymembers.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CS/windowsidentitymembers.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`Negotiate`| ||`Normal`| ||`false`| > [!NOTE] > 可以通过调用非托管代码（如 Windows API `LogonUser` 函数）来检索 `userToken` 表示的标记。You can retrieve the token represented by `userToken` by calling unmanaged code such as the Windows API `LogonUser` function. 通过调用 Windows API `CloseHandle` 函数，始终发布 `userToken`。Always release `userToken` by calling the Windows API `CloseHandle` function. 有关调用非托管代码的详细信息，请参阅[使用非托管 DLL 函数](/dotnet/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions)。For more information on calling unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](/dotnet/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions).

summary.span: 初始化以指定用户主名称 (UPN) 表示的用户的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified User Principal Name (UPN).

remarks.format: ## Remarks UPN*的格式@* *domainname*，即电子邮件地址。A UPN has the format *username*@*domainname*.com, in other words, an email address. `sUserPrincipalName` 中标识的 UPN 用于通过 Windows API `LsaLogonUser` 函数检索该用户的令牌。The UPN identified in `sUserPrincipalName` is used to retrieve a token for that user through the Windows API `LsaLogonUser` function. 然后，令牌用于标识用户。In turn that token is used to identify the user. 由于无法使用所提供的 UPN 登录，可能会返回异常。An exception might be returned due to the inability to log on using the supplied UPN. > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数仅适用于加入到 Windows Server 2003 或更高版本的域的计算机。This constructor is intended for use only on computers joined to Windows Server 2003 or later domains. 对于早期域类型，将引发异常。An exception is thrown for earlier domain types. 此限制的原因是此构造函数使用的是在 Windows Server 2003 中首次引入的[KERB_S4U_LOGON 结构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143533)。This restriction is due to the fact that this constructor uses the [KERB_S4U_LOGON structure](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143533), which was first introduced in Windows Server 2003. 此外，此构造函数还需要对目标用户帐户上的[标记-global 和通用（TGGAU）属性](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/331951/some-applications-and-apis-require-access-to-authorization-information)具有读取访问权限。Also, this constructor requires read access to the [token-groups-global-and-universal (TGGAU) attribute](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/331951/some-applications-and-apis-require-access-to-authorization-information) on the target user account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`Normal`| ||`false`| `type` 参数的值用于设置 参数。The value of the `type` parameter is used to set the parameter. 如果 `null``type`，则安全系统会将 设置为 Windows Vista 和更高版本的 windows 操作系统上的 `Negotiate`，并在早期版本的 Windows 操作系统上 `Kerberos`。If `type` is `null`, the security system sets to `Negotiate` on Windows Vista and later versions of the Windows operating system, and to `Kerberos` on earlier versions of the Windows operating system. 安全系统不使用此值;仅供参考。The security system does not use this value; it is for informational use only. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过调用非托管代码（如 Windows API `LogonUser` 函数）来检索 `userToken` 表示的标记。You can retrieve the token represented by `userToken` by calling unmanaged code such as the Windows API `LogonUser` function. 通过调用 Windows API `CloseHandle` 函数，始终发布 `userToken`。Always release `userToken` by calling the Windows API `CloseHandle` function. 有关调用非托管代码的详细信息，请参阅[使用非托管 DLL 函数](/dotnet/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions)。For more information on calling unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](/dotnet/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions). ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用 构造函数为指定的 Windows 帐户标记和指定的身份验证类型表示的用户创建 类的新实例。The following code shows the use of the constructor to create a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified Windows account token and the specified authentication type. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks `type` 参数的值用于设置 参数。The value of the `type` parameter is used to set the parameter. 如果 `null``type`，则安全系统会将 设置为 Windows Vista 和更高版本的 windows 操作系统上的 `Negotiate`，并在早期版本的 Windows 操作系统上 `Kerberos`。If `type` is `null`, the security system sets to `Negotiate` on Windows Vista and later versions of the Windows operating system, and to `Kerberos` on earlier versions of the Windows operating system. 安全系统不使用此值;仅供参考。The security system does not use this value; it is for informational use only. `sUserPrincipalName` 中标识的 UPN 用于通过 Windows API `LsaLogonUser` 函数检索该用户的令牌。The UPN identified in `sUserPrincipalName` is used to retrieve a token for that user through the Windows API `LsaLogonUser` function. 然后，令牌用于标识用户。In turn that token is used to identify the user. 由于无法使用所提供的 UPN 登录，可能会返回异常。An exception might be returned due to the inability to log on using the supplied UPN. > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数仅适用于加入到 Windows Server 2003 或更高版本的域的计算机。This constructor is intended for use only on computers joined to Windows Server 2003 or later domains. 对于早期域类型，将引发异常。An exception is thrown for earlier domain types. 此限制的原因是此构造函数使用的是在 Windows Server 2003 中首次引入的[KERB_S4U_LOGON 结构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143533)。This restriction is due to the fact that this constructor uses the [KERB_S4U_LOGON structure](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143533), which was first introduced in Windows Server 2003. 此外，此构造函数还需要对目标用户帐户上的[标记-global 和通用（TGGAU）属性](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/331951/some-applications-and-apis-require-access-to-authorization-information)具有读取访问权限。Also, this constructor requires read access to the [token-groups-global-and-universal (TGGAU) attribute](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/331951/some-applications-and-apis-require-access-to-authorization-information) on the target user account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `type` 参数的值用于设置 参数。The value of the `type` parameter is used to set the parameter. 如果 `null``type`，则安全系统会将 设置为 Windows Vista 和更高版本的 windows 操作系统上的 `Negotiate`，并在早期版本的 Windows 操作系统上 `Kerberos`。If `type` is `null`, the security system sets to `Negotiate` on Windows Vista and later versions of the Windows operating system, and to `Kerberos` on earlier versions of the Windows operating system. 安全系统不使用此值;仅供参考。The security system does not use this value; it is for informational use only. 可以通过调用非托管代码（如 Windows API `LogonUser` 函数）来检索 `userToken` 表示的标记。You can retrieve the token represented by `userToken` by calling unmanaged code such as the Windows API `LogonUser` function. 通过调用 Windows API `CloseHandle` 函数，始终发布 `userToken`。Always release `userToken` by calling the Windows API `CloseHandle` function. 有关调用非托管代码的详细信息，请参阅[使用非托管 DLL 函数](/dotnet/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions)。For more information on calling unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](/dotnet/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions). ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用 构造函数为由指定的 Windows 帐户标记、指定的身份验证类型、指定的 Windows 帐户类型和指定的身份验证状态表示的用户创建 类的新实例。The following code shows the use of the constructor to create a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified Windows account token, the specified authentication type, the specified Windows account type, and the specified authentication status. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以回收 占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回一个空的 对象，使你能够以匿名方式处理操作。This property returns an empty object that enables you to treat operations as anonymous. 属性值与 Windows 匿名用户不对应，因此不能用于模拟。The property value does not correspond to a Windows anonymous user and cannot be used for impersonation. 另请注意，此属性返回的标识不是静态的;对 的每个调用都将返回不同的匿名标识。Also, note that the identity returned by this property is not static; each call to returns a different anonymous identity. 您可以使用 属性来检测 中的返回值。You can use the property to detect the return value from . 但 会同时检测 Windows 匿名标识和此方法返回的匿名标识。However, detects both the Windows anonymous identity and the anonymous identity returned by this method. 若要使用后者标识，请缓存 返回值，而不是依赖于 属性。To use the latter identity, cache the return value instead of relying on the property. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用 方法返回表示匿名 Windows 用户的 对象。The following code shows the use of the method to return a object that represents an anonymous Windows user. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 模拟 对象表示的用户。

span.span: An object that represents the Windows user prior to impersonation; this can be used to revert to the original user's context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows NT 平台上，当前用户必须有足够的权限来允许进行模拟。On Windows NT platforms, the current user must have sufficient rights to allow impersonation. > [!WARNING] > 避免将此方法与 async/await 模式结合使用。Avoid using this method with the async/await pattern. 在某些情况下，它可能会导致由于模拟不会还原而导致的可靠性问题，即使生成的 `WindowsImpersonationContext` 被释放。In some cases it may lead to reliability issues due to impersonation not being reverted even if the resulting `WindowsImpersonationContext` is disposed. 请改用 `RunImpersonated`。Use `RunImpersonated` instead. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过调用非托管的 Win32 `LogonUser` 函数获取 Windows 帐户令牌，以及如何使用该令牌来模拟其他用户，然后恢复到原始标识。The following example demonstrates how to obtain a Windows account token by calling the unmanaged Win32 `LogonUser` function, and how to use that token to impersonate another user and then revert to the original identity. [!code-cpp[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows NT 平台上，当前用户必须有足够的权限来允许进行模拟。On Windows NT platforms, the current user must have sufficient rights to allow impersonation. > [!NOTE] > 使用 `userToken` 值 调用 方法等效于调用 Win32 `RevertToSelf` 函数。Calling the method with a `userToken` value of is equivalent to calling the Win32 `RevertToSelf` function. 如果当前正在模拟其他用户，则控件会恢复为原始用户。If another user is currently being impersonated, control reverts to the original user. 有关非托管代码调用的详细信息，请参阅[使用非托管 DLL 函数](/dotnet/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions)。For more information about calls to unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](/dotnet/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions). > [!WARNING] > 避免将此方法与 async/await 模式结合使用。Avoid using this method with the async/await pattern. 在某些情况下，它可能会导致由于模拟不会还原而导致的可靠性问题，即使生成的 `WindowsImpersonationContext` 被释放。In some cases it may lead to reliability issues due to impersonation not being reverted even if the resulting `WindowsImpersonationContext` is disposed. 请改用 `RunImpersonated`。Use `RunImpersonated` instead. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过调用非托管的 Win32 `LogonUser` 函数获取 Windows 帐户令牌，以及如何使用该令牌来模拟其他用户，然后恢复到原始标识。The following example demonstrates how to obtain a Windows account token by calling the unmanaged Win32 `LogonUser` function, and how to use that token to impersonate another user and then revert to the original identity. [!code-csharp[WindowsIdentity Impersonation2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/windowsidentity impersonation2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WindowsIdentity Impersonation2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/windowsidentity impersonation2/vb/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取用户的 Windows 帐户标记。

span.span: Gets the Windows account token for the user.

value.span: 与当前执行线程关联的访问令牌的句柄。

span.span: The handle of the access token associated with the current execution thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不要显式释放 属性返回的帐户标记。Do not explicitly release the account token that is returned by the property. 令牌由 方法释放，可在代码中调用。The token is released by the method, which you can call in code. 垃圾回收器也会自动调用 。 is also automatically called by the garbage collector. > [!NOTE] > 属性返回的帐户令牌是用于创建 对象的 Windows 令牌的副本，由 .NET Framework 自动发布。The account token that is returned by the property is a duplicate of the Windows token that is used to create the object and is automatically released by the .NET Framework. 这不同于用于创建 对象的帐户标记（构造函数的 `userToken` 参数）。This is different from the account token (the `userToken` parameter for the constructor), which is used to create the object. `userToken` 是通过调用 `LogonUser` 创建的 Windows 帐户令牌，必须将其关闭以避免内存泄漏。`userToken` is a Windows account token that is created by a call to `LogonUser` and must be closed to avoid a memory leak. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用 属性获取用户的 Windows 帐户标记。The following code shows the use of the property to get the Windows account token for the user. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
